summary: Adds a small library on top of one of the Dragonsreach main hall mezzanines.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Hello[/b]

[b]About this Mod:[/b]
After many years of stalking the Nexus, I thought it was about time that I created a mod myself. So I bit the bullet, or rather the arrow, (which is not easy when it's sticking out of your knee, I can tell you) and created this small mod.

[b]What is this Mod?:
[/b]This just adds a small library to the far end of the right-hand[i] mezzanine[/i] as you enter the main hall of Dragonsreach, which I always thought looked a bit empty anyway. It contains a few items of furniture, a little decoration, and at the moment, four books containing short stories, written by yours truly. It uses vanilla assets, is completely lore-friendly and has had the nav-mesh tweaked so as not to cause problems with npcs. The books are set to 'Player' so can be taken without having to resort to thievery ;)

Non of the DLCs are required for this mod.

[b]Installation:
[/b]Use NMM or download and extract the 'Adventure books.esp' (no other files are needed) and place in your Skyrim Data folder. Load order is probably unimportant but, as usual, later is probably better than earlier.

NB. SHOULD RUN FINE ON SKYRIM SPECIAL EDITION TOO.

[b]Version history:

[/b]V1.0  ........... Contains three books: Draugr Tomb, The Giant Whisperer, Lost Legionary.
V1.1  ........... New book added: Mage's Mistake.
author: The Lone Scribe
